discussion.p: optional didn't benefit from the wording modifications by P0185 "Adding [nothrow_]swappable traits"; as such, it suffers from LWG , and does not play nice with swappable traits.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4606.

blockquote.p:
[…]
-4- Remarks: The expression inside noexcept is equivalent to:

blockquote.pre: template <class T> void swap(optional<T>& x, optional<T>& y) noexcept(noexcept(x.swap(y)));

blockquote.p:
-1- Effects: Calls x.swap(y).
-?- Remarks: This function shall not participate in overload resolution unless is_move_constructible_v<T> is true and is_swappable_v<T> is true.
